content: same stitch as the join all rounds end by joining with a slip_stitch to the first stitch unless otherwise stated on the join s marked with a ** **join you join with a slip_stitch to the first stitch pull the loop out a little and remove your hook turn your work around where the back of the stitches are facing you and insert your hook from behind into the same stitch where you joined place the loop onto your hook tighten it down and pull it through to the back of the stitch turn you work back the right way and chain 1 or 2 depending on the next row of stitches this minimizes the seam please see images on page 6 sizing this pattern is written for sizes preschool child and average adult and should fit an average sized head for those sizes at the end of this pattern i have include the hat size chart that i used to determine sizing you can use this as a guide to make more sizes if need be gauge for this pattern is 8 double_crochet s and 4 row = 2 inches if you are having an issue reaching gauge try going up or down a hook size leesa nixon aka leesa s knotty corner ©2020 this pattern is for personal use only it may not be copied reproduced edited or modified in any way or
